function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease transmission through primary data collection and sharing","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and safety measures, promote data anonymization, and develop secure data sharing protocols","Technologies":"Digital health technologies, data encryption and anonymization tools","People":"Researchers, healthcare workers, data scientists, and the general public","Owner":"Research organizations, government health agencies, technology companies"},{"Description":"Perception of science and research funding","Impact":"Decreased public trust in science, reduced funding for research, and hindered collaboration in international scientific endeavors","Mitigation":"Transparent communication, public engagement, and advocacy for science funding","Technologies":"Science communication platforms, public engagement tools, and advocacy campaigns","People":"Scientists, researchers, policymakers, and the general public","Owner":"Scientific institutions, government agencies, and science communication organizations"}]}
